item.title: How To: Absurd Scientific Advice for Common Real-World Problems
item.description:
Do not try any of this at home. The author of this book is an internet cartoonist, not a health or safety expert.

In a nutshell, Randall Munroe takes the humor that makes up xkcd and the what if series and turns it into a book series. It’s weird, it’s wonderful, and it’s worth a read. You might just learn something– even if it’s not at all the thing you were expecting to learn.
